name: Battle Cry
description: [Party] Temporarily increases the Attack Power of both you and party members within close proximity.

name: Temper Armour
description: [Guild] Temporarily increases the Defense of both you and guild members within the target area.

name: Ancient`s Favour
description: Temporarily increases the Elemental Damages and level of your summoned ally.

name: Spirit Smash
description: Inflicts Air Damage to a target and temporarily decreases its Strength and Stamina.

name: Chakram Finesse
description: Increases your Attack Power, Accuracy and reduces your Skill Cast Times when using a Chakram.

name: Ancient`s Haste
description: Temporarily increases Pet's Attack Speed and Damage. Pet's Attacks have a chance of ignoring target's Defense.

name: Frozen Darts
description: Inflicts Ice Damage to a target and temporarily decreases its Intelligence and Wisdom.

name: Ancient`s Protection
description: Temporarily increases Defense, Elemental Resistance, and Skill Block Rate of you and your Pet. Normal Attacks have chance of ignoring target's Elemental Resistance.

name: Wind Shear
description: Inflicts Air Damage to targets within a certain radius and temporarily decreases their Elemental Resistance.

name: Bomba
description: Inflicts a Physical Damage on targets within a certain radius by making your pet explode and temporarily decreases their Skill Block Rate.

name: Strike Mark
description: Temporarily increases All Stats of both you and your current target.
